channel.title: A new Pk system(Need Coder Help)
channel.description:
Ok Hello, Im Will from Elit3scape. Im about 3 months into coding and I understand the basics. Today I added 3 New Pk weapons. I am trying to make my own Pk system that is new to my server. I finished a great Pk shop. Now im trying to figure out a Pk point system. But its different then your usaual. One of the things used to buy alot of things in my server is tokkuls. So now im trying to figure out how to in pk when you kill someone u get tokkuls when you kill them, is there any way of doing this? Please leave your reply, or pm me if u know what i could do. Im also looking for a coder, if u wanna help me code(we have 20ish online)
-Owner Will

I can help you with all of that, add my msn, finalspeced@hotmail.com
